Mistletoe

Viscum album, Phoradendron leucarpum, Phoradendron flave-scens

Last Updated: October 27, 2022 at 07:20pm by drf

Also known as: All Heal, Birdlime, Devil's Fuge, Donnerbesen, European Mistletoe, Golden Bough, Holy Wood, Lignam sanctae crucis, Misseltoe, Thunderbesem, Witches Broom, Wood of the Cross, Mystyldene
